issue.title: [JS] Update flatbuffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13514](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13514). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Update the flatbuffers npm package to version 2
- Remove @types/flatbuffers since flatbuffers comes with its own typings
- Update the generated flatbuffers

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13514?focusedCommentId=17476164) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~domoritz]` Do you plan to resolve this for 7.0? We're planning to cut a release candidate during the next week.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13514?focusedCommentId=17476190) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Already done in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10371. We're just wrapping up some benchmarking and fixing performance regressions.
